arts.ttl: ‘Dreaming is allowed’ - Flick speaks out after Barca beat Atletico
arts.sum: Hansi Flick says “dreaming is allowed” after Barcelona booked their spot in the Copa del Rey final by beating Atletico Madrid . I think it’s one of the best teams, not just in Spain but in Europe, but yes we are happy.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone explains thoughts on ‘failure’ before facing Barcelona in season-defining semi-final
arts.sum: “The team has competed very well so far, in the Champions League we competed very well, in the cup as well, we are having a good league season and we will continue game by game. I repeat that we have been good in the Champions League, in the cup, we lost 4-5 against a rival that plays very well and deserved to go through, and in the league we are competing well and we will continue in the same way.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid 0-1 Barcelona (agg 4-5): Ferran Torres goal sets up El Clasico Copa del Rey final
arts.sum: Barcelona overcome Atletico Madrid to set up an El Clasico Copa del Rey final

arts.ttl: Barcelona gets past Atletico to reach Copa del Rey final against Real Madrid
arts.sum: The rivals will meet in the Copa decider for the first time since the 2013-14 season, when Madrid won the title. Barcelona won 1-0 at Atletico Madrid to reach its first Copa del Rey final in four seasons on Wednesday, setting up a “clasico” against Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: How to Watch Atletico Madrid vs. Barcelona: Copa del Rey Semifinals
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid host Barcelona for their fourth meeting of the season in the second leg of the Copa Del Rey semifinals.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Barcelona: Prediction, kick-off time, TV, live stream, team news, h2h results, odds
arts.sum: Atletico and Barcelona look to book a place in the final after an eight-goal first leg

arts.ttl: Barcelona predicted lineup vs Atletico Madrid
arts.sum: Barcelona will book their place in the Copa del Rey final with another victory in the Spanish capital on Wednesday night. Madrid has been a happy hunting ground for the La Liga leaders this season, with Hansi Flick's side claiming memorable victories in the capital's two grand amphitheatres.

arts.ttl: Barcelona injury news: Hansi Flick confirms fitness boost ahead of Atletico Madrid Copa del Rey semi-final clash
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick reveals whether Pau Cubarsi and Raphinha will be able to start Wednesday's Copa del Rey semi-final second leg against Atletico Madrid.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid quoted €45m to complete “almost impossible” deal for Manchester City target
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid have set their sights on one of the South America’s brightest talents, but signing him will not be easy – and not only because Manchester City are also said to be sniffing around. Last week, it was reported that Atleti have registered their interest in Franco Mastantuono. The teenage attacker had been closely […] The post Atletico Madrid quoted €45m to complete “almost impossible” deal for Manchester City target appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Barcelona lineups: Confirmed team news, predicted XIs and injury latest for Copa del Rey
arts.sum: Raphinha should return for Barca while Diego Simeone faces several huge selection decisions
